body_html:
Try to build tensorflow add -linkopt='-lrt':

bazel build  --linkopt='-lrt' -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

https://github.com/wangyum/Anaconda/blob/master/doc/installing-tensorflow-from-sources.md#package-tensorflow
body_text:
Try to build  tensorflow add -linkopt='-lrt':
bazel build  --linkopt='-lrt' -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

https://github.com/wangyum/Anaconda/blob/master/doc/installing-tensorflow-from-sources.md#package-tensorflow
body:
Try to build  tensorflow add `-linkopt='-lrt'`:
```
bazel build  --linkopt='-lrt' -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```

https://github.com/wangyum/Anaconda/blob/master/doc/installing-tensorflow-from-sources.md#package-tensorflow
